product_name: BeautyBioBright Eyes Depuffing and Brightening Eye Gels
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsBeautyBio's Bright Eyes Depuffing and Brightening Eye Gels, infused with colloidal silver and collagen, instantly de-puff, brighten, and fill in the appearance of fine lines.
details: DetailsResearch Results97% felt under-eye puffiness was reduced93% agreed the under-eye area felt firmer100% agreed eyes appeared brighter93% noticed the under-eye area looked younger93% noticed a reduction in the apperance of dark circles100% said under-eye skin felt smootherIn a Consumer Perception SurveyKey IngredientsPure Colloidal Silver - Encourages skin rejuvenation to give the look of 10 hours of rest after just 10 minutes of applicationIlluminating Pearl - Helps eyes instantly appear brighterNatural Collagen - Firms and tightens skin to hide lack of sleep from the night beforeAloe Vera - A true superhero ingredient chock-full of vitamins, minerals and detoxing agents that promote healthy looking skinFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesFormaldehydeTriclosanHydroquinoneTriclocarbanOxybenzoneItem 2572408How To UseApply to clean, dry skin. May be used under the eyes and on nose-to-mouth lines. Allow key ingredients to soak into application area for at least 10 minutes, may be worn longer. Discard patches after each use.Precautions: Avoid direct eye contact. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. This product contains silver and/or silver salts. Avoid contact with broken or abraded skin.IngredientsWater/aqua/eau, Glycerin, Colloidal Silver, Propylene Glycol, Betaine, Hamamelis Virginiana (witch Hazel) Extract, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Mica, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glucomannan, Algin, Niacinamide, Pearl Powder, Fragrance/parfum, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Chloride, Citric Acid, Potassium Citrate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin. May be used under the eyes and on nose-to-mouth lines. Allow key ingredients to soak into application area for at least 10 minutes, may be worn longer. Discard patches after each use.Precautions: Avoid direct eye contact. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. This product contains silver and/or silver salts. Avoid contact with broken or abraded skin.

reviews.headline: They are too dry now
reviews.comments: These were excellent, but the past two packs i purchased have haf next to no product on them. They appear dried out.

reviews.headline: The only patch that works for me
reviews.comments:
Havibg tries a dozen or more brands, these are the best patches I've found. Puffiness was drastically reduced after one wear. Admittedly, i leave then on 5 extra minutes then switch them to my upper lids. 
Eyes are brighter, smoother, less puffy.

The only con is they dont initially stick very well, but are fine after 3 minutes

reviews.headline: Received an old batch of eye patches
reviews.comments: I'm pretty disappointed with my recent Ulta order. I purchased the Beauty Bio eye patches, but it seems I got an old batch. When I opened one of the packets, the patches were so dried out that they fell apart when I tried to put them on. I've bought these several times before, and I've never had this problem.

reviews.headline: Didn't see any results
reviews.comments: Was disappointed with these. Tried them due to the high rating but I didn't see any improvement/results after using them, personally. They, also, don't stay on very well.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Mine are dried out. Will be returning

reviews.headline: Best eye gel pads
reviews.comments: I normally don't like eye pads they are usually gimmicky and don't work. But I use these when I'm really tired or very puffy. I know there's great ingredients but these are magical. I look bright eyes and bushy tailed like I'm in my mid 20's again!

reviews.headline: Great eye mask!
reviews.comments: I love that these stick on my face so well. I wake up, wash my face, walk to my fridge (where I store them) and slap them on. They stay on without budging the entire time im walking around doing my morming routine. Im uncertain how much they brighten my eyes yet, but i know for sure they de-puff them. Will continue to purchase for sure! My only small complaint is i wish the packaging made it easier for the serum liquid to stay on the gels and not go elsewhere. The serum is the most important part.

reviews.headline: A lot in a pack, too bad they burn my skin!
reviews.comments: I have tried these multiple times, I want to like them but I really don't. They burn my skin. Its nice to have so many in a pack but completely useless if you have sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I've tried most Eye Gels that's Ulta has to offer and these are by far the best! Immediate results! Before & after photos show 10 minute difference! (Don't mind my blood shot eyes, I had just woke up and put my contacts in)

reviews.headline: One of my best beauty purchases
reviews.comments: I initially could not understand why this face roller was so expensive. I still can't answer that but am so impressed with the results. I have almost every beauty gadget but think this is seriously one of my very best purchases. It's incredible and really depuffs and lifts the face.

reviews.headline: I am going to buy these often
reviews.comments: Results are well worth the money. I could not believe my eyes.. literally!! Amazing ðŸ™‚

reviews.headline: Eye must have
reviews.comments: I got these as a birthday gift and I am on my last pack. I have tried these twice and they have depuffed and gave me brighter look afterwards. Also I had no issues with them staying in palce once they were on, no scent & easy usage. I used these with my jade roller that I keep in the freezer. I would purchase them if they were a little cheaper.  Hoping for another gift..Lol

reviews.headline: impressed!
reviews.comments: i received these for my birthday gift from ULTA & didn't have high expectations. however, they were so soothing & brightening. i'm very impressed

reviews.headline: Dried out
reviews.comments: Got these for the birthday gift and were fantasticâ€¦ went and bought the big pack at Ulta and they were all dried ououtâ€¦

reviews.headline: So far So good
reviews.comments: I received the sample back for my birthday, and I wasn't sure if they would work for my sensitive skin but they do. Although they tend to slip, I love how they feel and my eye definitely feel hydrated. I will be purchasing. I gave 4 stars only because I've only used the 3 in the sample back. Will use regularly for the next month to see if there is change in my fine lines and dark circles.

reviews.headline: Great!!
reviews.comments: I love these. I got them as a sample for my birthday and bought the big pack because I really liked them. I think they're a bit expensive for how much are in the pack, but the product is great! Super hydrating and feels great on your skin.

reviews.headline: Shocked
reviews.comments: Got these from Ulta for my birthday gift and was pleasantly surprised when I first tried them I couldn't because how they brightened under my eyes and took away all the puffiness I will definitely be buying these , they also feel very nice under the eyes I didn't want to take them off !

reviews.headline: Birthday gift
reviews.comments: I got these as a birthday gift and they're pretty good. Cooling was a plus and they were extra cooling after I put them in the fridge. I'm going to finish the pack and might purchase again.

reviews.headline: Was Skeptical
reviews.comments: In all honesty, I would have never purchases these, I received them as a birthday gift from Ulta. I tried them thinking they would cause my eyes to burn, but instead I love them and plan to purchase them. They are non-irritating, cool and definitely help my tires under eyes.

reviews.headline: cant tell if they really do anything
reviews.comments: I either didn't have dark circles bad enough for this product to help them or or they just don't work

media.caption: They come packaged nicely. But I always had one that stuck to the inside of the package and I had to dig it out. I was afraid I was going to rip it.

media.headline: beauty bio so comfortable to brighten eyes

faceoff_positive.comments: Very hydrating. My eyes feel refreshed after use. Haven't seen a big  change in color as of yet but I'll continue to use.
faceoff_positive.headline: Hydrating

faceoff_negative.comments: The first time I opened the pack, liquid spilled all over my counter. I went in to pull out the plastic piece and only one eye gel was on the plastic holder. The second eye gel was still in the packaging bunched up on the bottom. Once I put the eye gels on, I was pleased with the feeling and the way they stayed on my face. I was unaware to keep them in the refrigerator so the first time it wasn't cool. After reading to do so, I put the remainder patches in the refrigerator. The second time opening the package, I was more careful. The same thing did happen like the first time with one gel patch at the bottom of the packaging. This time I enjoyed the patches on my face more after being in the refrigerator. After using it, I don't seem a huge difference to have to keep dealing with the liquid in the packaging spilling.
faceoff_negative.headline: BeautyBio Bright Eyes Brightening Gels

rollup.name: Bright Eyes Depuffing and Brightening Eye Gels
